attributes.action: Increase the tax-free allowance to the equivalent of the National Minimum Wage worked for 37½ hours per week.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It is crazy that a person on National Minimum Wage pays tax.  By definition, they are earning very little.

Once above this level, tax should be progressive and the bands could be adjusted to neutralise the overall tax take.  Rates of over 40% may be necessary for the very high earners.
